bibl.title: The First Two Volumes of Petra Papyri.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Jaakko Frösén, Antti Arjava & Marjo Lehtinen, with contributions by several authors, The Petra Papyri. I = American Center of Oriental Research Publications. 4 (Amman, 2002); - Antti Arjava, Matias Buchholz & Traianos Gagos, with contributions by several authors, The Petra Papyri. III = American Center of Oriental Research Publications. 5 (Amman, 2007).
bibl.seg: Rodney Ast, The First Two Volumes of Petra Papyri.
